text:
@realDonaldTrump I have questions.

How is a domestic pandemic comparable to foreign wars?
How did US soldiers et al. vote during WWI & WWII?
Can you cite any election security experts to support your claims?
How would you protect voters from COVID19 if they vote in-person?
WTF is wrong with you?
